title: Multithreading Models
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
Mapping user threads (library) to kernel threads (actual CPU).
- **Many-to-One**: All user threads map to 1 kernel thread. (Old Java). Blocks if one blocks.
- **One-to-One**: 1-1 map. (Linux/Windows). True concurrency.
- **Many-to-Many**: Multiplex.

interview_questions.question: Which model is used by modern Linux?

exam_notes: User threads are fast (no kernel call).
